TutorialÂ¶

This tutorial goes through each and every step of the process to assemble and operate a water quality sensor. No experience is required. We will cover everything from buying the required parts to downloading code to the designated platform.

Dependencies:

For this project there are two classes of dependencies. The hardware and the software. We will start with the hardware since it requires the purchase of and delivery of equipment. A link to a list of all required dependencies is on the home page.
